script.name: !lib.menu.getobject
script.sourceplaintext:
$page.id = 6023
if $a.flags do if $a.flags & [Find.Player] $a.includeOwn = [TRUE] $a.flags = $a.flags & ( ~ ( [Find.Multiple] | [Find.Nearest] | [Find.Player] ) ) end
if $a.event == [MEvent.Start] gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input
else if $a.event == 'getobject.your.station' $text = read text: page=$page.id id=2 $input = create input: id='getobject.selected', user input=Var/Station owned by Player, refobj=$a.obj, description=$text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input
else if $a.event == 'getobject.selected' $a.obj ->set local variable: name='getobject' value=$a.extra return [TRUE]
else if $a.event == 'getobject.station' $text = read text: page=$page.id id=3 $input = create input: id='station.selected', user input=Var/Station, refobj=$a.obj, description=$text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=$a.flags, default=null return $input
else if $a.event == 'getobject.menu' if is datatype[ $a.extra ] == DATATYPE_ARRAY $value = $a.extra[0] if $value -> exists $ship ->set local variable: name='input.station' value=$value return [TRUE] end else if $a.extra == 'getobject.your.station' $text = read text: page=$page.id id=2 $input = create input: id='getobject.selected', user input=Var/Station owned by Player, refobj=$a.obj, description=$text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input else if $a.extra == 'getobject.station' $text = read text: page=$page.id id=3 $input = create input: id='getobject.selected', user input=Var/Station, refobj=$a.obj, description=$text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=$a.flags, default=null return $input else if $a.extra == 'getobject.your.ship' $text = read text: page=6020 id=260 $input = create input: id='getobject.selected', user input=Var/Ship owned by Player, refobj=$a.obj, description=$text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=null, default=null return $input else if $a.extra == 'getobject.ship' $text = read text: page=6020 id=260 $input = create input: id='getobject.selected', user input=Var/Ship, refobj=$a.obj, description=$text, without sector=[FALSE], filterclass=null, racemask=null, flags=$a.flags, default=null return $input
else if $a.extra -> exists $a.obj ->set local variable: name='getobject' value=$a.extra return [TRUE] end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Cancelled] if $a.extra == 'getobject.selected' gosub sub.BuildMenu return $input end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Returned] $menu.id = $a.extra[0] $selection = $a.extra[1] $value = $a.extra[2] if $menu.id == 'getobject.menu' if $selection == 'getobject.selected' $input = create menu return to previous menu: value=$value return $input end end
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Arguments] $target = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='getobject' $previous = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='getobject.previous' skip if $previous $previous = table alloc $previous[$a.cmd] = $target $a.obj ->set local variable: name='getobject.previous' value=$previous $ret = create new array, arguments=$target, null, null, null, null return $ret
else if $a.event == [MEvent.Finished] $a.obj ->set local variable: name='getobject' value=null end
return null
sub.BuildMenu: $obj.sector = $a.obj -> get sector
$menu = create custom menu array
$table.done = table alloc
$previous = $a.obj -> get local variable: name='getobject.previous' if $previous $check.obj = $previous[$a.cmd] $obj.text.id = 261 gosub sub.DrawObj end
$check.obj = get player tracking aim $obj.text.id = 201 gosub sub.DrawObj
if $a.station $f = $a.flags | [Find.Nearest] $check.obj = find station: sector=$obj.sector class or type=Station race=null flags=$a.flags refobj=$a.obj maxdist=999999999 maxnum=null refpos=null $obj.text.id = 226 gosub sub.DrawObj
$check.obj = $a.obj -> get homebase $obj.text.id = 240 gosub sub.DrawObj
$check.obj = get player HQ $obj.text.id = 252 gosub sub.DrawObj end
if $a.ships add section to custom menu: $menu
$f = $a.flags | [Find.Nearest] $check.obj = find ship: sector=$obj.sector class or type=Ship race=null flags=$a.flags refobj=$a.obj maxdist=2147483647 maxnum=null refpos=null $obj.text.id = 226 gosub sub.DrawObj
$check.obj = [PLAYERSHIP] $obj.text.id = 251 gosub sub.DrawObj end
add section to custom menu: $menu
if $a.includeOwn if $a.station $text = read text: page=$page.id id=2 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue='getobject.your.station' end if $a.ships $text = read text: page=6020 id=259 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue='getobject.your.ship' end end
if $a.station $text = read text: page=$page.id id=3 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue='getobject.station' end if $a.ships $text = read text: page=6020 id=260 add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue='getobject.ship' end
$text = get command info: command=$a.cmd if $text add custom menu info line to array $menu: text=$text end
gosub sub.DoIcon
$title = get command name: command=$a.cmd gosub sub.GetMenuText $input = create input: id='getobject.menu' menu=$menu title=$title description=$text callback=null endsub
sub.DrawObj: gosub sub.FilterObj if $ret.Checked if not $table.done[$check.obj] $text = sprintf: pageid=6020 textid=$obj.text.id, $check.obj, null, null, null, null add custom menu item to array $menu: text=$text returnvalue=$check.obj $table.done[$check.obj] = [TRUE] end end endsub
sub.FilterObj: $ret.Checked = [FALSE] $sub.RightClass = [FALSE] if $check.obj -> exists if $check.obj != $a.obj if $a.station if $check.obj -> is of class Station $sub.RightClass = [TRUE] end end if $a.ships if $check.obj -> is of class Ship $sub.RightClass = [TRUE] end end end if $sub.RightClass if $check.obj -> is of class Ship $obj.owner = $check.obj -> get true owner else $obj.owner = $check.obj -> get owner race end if $obj.owner == Player if $a.includeOwn $ret.Checked = [TRUE] end endsub else if $a.flags & [Find.Enemy] if $a.obj -> is $check.obj a enemy $ret.Checked = [TRUE] endsub end end if $a.flags & [Find.Friend] if $a.obj -> is $check.obj a friend $ret.Checked = [TRUE] endsub end end if $a.flags & [Find.Neutral] if $a.obj -> is $check.obj neutral to me $ret.Checked = [TRUE] endsub end end end end end endsub
return null
sub.DoIcon: set menu option: $menu, icon=2 endsub
sub.GetMenuText: $text = read text: page=$page.id id=1
if $a.cmd == COMMAND_ATTACK_SHIELDS if $a.ships AND $a.station $text = read text: page=$page.id id=6 else if $a.ships $text = read text: page=$page.id id=4 else if $a.station $text = read text: page=$page.id id=5 end end
endsub return null

line.text: create menu return to previous menu: value=
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu item to array
add custom menu info line to array
add custom menu item to array
